description: Microsoft's updated Photos app is now available for Windows 11 in the Windows Insider Program, bringing requested interface changes and better image quality. [...]
title: Microsoft Photos update brings requested features to Windows 11

description: Hackers are exploiting a flaw in a premium Facebook module for PrestaShop named pkfacebook to deploy a card skimmer on vulnerable e-commerce sites and steal people's payment credit card details. [...]
title: Facebook PrestaShop module exploited to steal credit cards
